about_the_game:
Dive deeper into the world of Terminus: Zombie Survivors with the original soundtrack, crafted by award-winning composer Emmett Cooke.

This album includes 12 tracks that capture the suspenseful and eerie atmosphere of a post-apocalyptic world, providing a total of 1 hour of music. It’s designed to enhance your experience of the game’s dramatic and immersive world, available to enjoy whenever you wish to revisit the haunting vibe of Terminus: Zombie Survivors.

The soundtrack is available in MP3 and FLAC lossless formats.

name: Terminus: Zombie Survivors - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 250 MB available space
